value: Landscape of Cabo de Gata-Níjar Natural Park

With the highest number of hours sunshine and lowest rainfall in Europe, Almeria is often regarded as one of the most desirable destinations to live.  Summer days are long, warm and plentiful and even in January you might still be wearing a t-shirt if the sun comes up bright enough.  The area is known as one of high unemployment but with its hot climate, new wealth is arriving in the form of agriculture; fruit, vegetables and flowers.  Due to the climate much of the landscape is dry and desert-like, but lunar landscapes and fabulous rock formations are abundant and this amazing terrain made Almeria home to some of the greatest spaghetti westerns ever made.
